title: Campustalkative
description: Campustalkative is an application that aims to help people get the closest place to which they can get what they want to purchase.

featuredImage.caption: Featured image showing mockups of CT app

problem.description: The challenge was to create a simple interface that feels like a simple search system where users can search for what they need and then get the location and direction to the closest place.

processes.title: Creating Userflow diagram
processes.caption: User flow diagram
processes.description: My colleague and I contributed in creating the Userflow diagram of Campustalkative. This was essential both to the design and development of the application

processes.title: Testing and Light Iteration
processes.description: We did a lot of test to make sure the flow works correctly and all the neccessary screens are in place for developement.
